cause.description:
give money to gram hummell, so that he can spend it.
1. Gram Hummell wants your money.
2. i know it says Barack Obama is the benefactor. But i just did that so i can validate this cause.
3. All real money goes to the real Gram Hummell, through a series of stamped envelopes sent to Gram Hummell's address.
cause.name: Give Gram Hummell Money
